subject: Implement core revenue model calculator functionality
body:
Added complete implementation for 6 core revenue models:
- One-Time Purchase (Perpetual License)
- Subscription (SaaS)
- Freemium
- Usage-Based (Consumption)
- Tiered Pricing
- Per-Seat/Per-User

Features implemented:
- Dynamic form generation for model-specific inputs
- Real-time calculation engine with 24-month forecasts
- Interactive ApexCharts visualizations (3 charts per model)
- Metrics panel with key performance indicators
- Debounced input handling for smooth UX
- Responsive layout with Tailwind CSS

Technical details:
- File size: 60KB (well under 200KB target)
- Lines of code: 1,312 (within 1,050-1,600 estimate)
- No build process required
- All functionality client-side
